column2: "Good morning! So, did you know? Skill Rings grow and develop."
"As you wear them, they store a record of your battles."
"If you wear one for long enough, the EXP it records will allow it to power up!"
"If you have a ring that you've worn for a while, you should show it to a clerk in the Shop Area."

"There is a limit to how much a Skill Ring can be strengthened.

When you earn EXP while wearing a ring, the ring itself gains Ring EXP."

"When a ring earns enough Ring EXP, its strengthening limit will increase.

You can have a ring strengthened at the Item Lab in the Shop Area, using gathering materials and meseta.

"When strengthening an L ring, you can also select a Ring parameter to raise.

The parameters you can select to raise vary by the type of ring."
